content: Do you want to win a Casascius Error Dual Panel?This is the best opportunity for you !Eclipse Poster: 2011 Casascius "Error" Dual PanelTotal Print: 11 sets( Side a & b )Poster Edition: IIIMaterial: Waterproof, Fadeproof, Semi gloss, High resolution poster paper.Subject Matter: 2011 Casascius "Error"Size: 18 Inches x 24 Inches = 45.72 Cm x 60.96 CmPoster value: 200$Each poster is signed with a fine tip white marker.Each poster has been designed and printed within the USA. Made in the USA to the highest quality standardsTo partecipate at this giveaway, you'll have to do this task for 6 weeks:Post below:QuoteBitcointalk.org username:Your twitter account:Your instagram account:Twitter: Follow our marketplace here !Instagram: Follow our marketplace here !Rules:  - Every participant must follow the pages upside linked.- Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit)- Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers- Instagram account must be original.- Instagram account must have a minimum of 200 followers.- You must make minimum of 2 retweets & 2 tweets per week. Mention Eclipsepayments, Be sure to include following hashtag  #casascius #collectibles #bitcoin #gold #poster- Share instagram content in your history or in your profile. - Every retweet must be liked.- The more you tweet the more your chance will be higher to win.- Follow this thread and also see the spreadsheet, if you have any issues with the data please contact me.Report Format for twitter:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your partecipation will be canceled:QuoteBitcointalk username:Twitter Profile Link:Week 1Retweet Link 1Retweet Link 2Week 1Tweet Link 1Tweet Link 2...DISCLAIMER: I'm not involved with this kind of activity, I simply work as marketing manager for Eclipse33. Owner of the Giveaway: Eclipse33Manager of the Giveaway: Gianluca95
